name: Stab by Step
description:
You have to choose one of several variations of actions to complete the puzzle.

If you and the enemy fall on the same square, you will die, in fact, like the enemy.

The shield icon means that you will stay on the current cell and block the enemy's attack.

You can control the camera with mouse and zoom with mouth scroll wheel.

You must get to the castle by any means. Good luck!
